Replace.Text: OK, we agree, harmony brings wealth.
I've been too busy lately. I don't have time to think about this. Business is the most important thing.
Tianlu Trading wants to discuss a business deal with you. This is the agreement. If you agree, please sign it quickly. Time waits for no one.
Great, now I’m going to make a lot of money!
Oh my, have your wings become hard?
You really don't think we won't fight, do you?
It's time to show you my strength~
Are you all here to discuss business? Come in, there's plenty of time.
Business is busy, please don't disturb!
Tianlu Trading sent someone to bring you some gadgets you have never seen before, you will definitely like them!
We are not to be trifled with...!
Use your brain!
Oh, my dear guest, are you here to discuss business with Xuheng? You have met a distinguished person!
Go this way and you will reach Xuheng. Would you like to visit it with us?
Oh! Is this your city? It's so magnificent! I must make a fortune here!
You're from far away? How about we change seats so we can talk business later?
I am not blind. What are so many troops doing here?
Leave quickly, don’t ruin our good thing!
Hey! We were the first to see this piece of land!
Humph, how dare you do this?
It’s not that easy to steal our trade secrets!
Huh? You still don't want to give up?
I have my own beliefs, I don't need you to teach me!
You are so annoying...
We'll take note of this...
Nice, nice, great deal
Nice, nice, great deal
Nice, nice, great deal
You are really stingy (helpless)
You are really stingy (helpless)
You are really stingy (helpless)
Business opportunities are everywhere in this world, but your explorers have never set foot outside their own territory. Sigh (sigh)
Lu Liang is disappointed with your lagging progress in exploring the map
Tianyuan Divine Realm--Hundred Solutions
Divine Realm Tianyuan
Luliang
I am Lu Liang, the president of Tianlu Trading! Follow me and I will make you rich and well-fed.
Tianlu Magic

Immediately after creating a capital, you gain Luliang, Yingzhao, Pioneer (not available to computer players), 2 merchants, and 2 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacities. The "{LOC_TECH_CELESTIAL_NAVIGATION_NAME}" technology is unlocked at the beginning of the game. All cities you create or capture have trade posts from the beginning. After creating a trade route, a trade post will immediately appear in the destination city. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route -50% [ICON_Faith] Faith output. All cities have [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith +5 [ICON_Gold] Gold
Time is money, money is life... no, it is more important than life! ——Lu Liang
Enterprise-level understanding
Hates civilizations that lag behind her in exploring maps
